entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5 except minus 8 over the Highlands. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning with risk of snow squalls. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5 except minus 8 over the Highlands. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
